text: @BrianKarem @PressSec @realDonaldTrump I saw this tweet and just burst into tears. How much more of this bullshit lying can we take? He didn’t know about the coronavirus. He didn’t know about our troops. But he’s the most informed person on earth? This is just too gross! #TraitorTrump
